<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        
        <script src='/system.js'></script>
        <title>Aquameta</title>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width">
        
        <link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,700' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
        <style>
            html {
                box-sizing: border-box;
                background-color: black;
                color: white;
            }
            *, *:before, *:after {
                box-sizing: inherit;
            }
            body {
                font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
            }
            html, body {
                height: 100%;
                margin: 0;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body></body>
    <script>
        System.import('/widget.js').then(function(widget) {
            
            var db = new AQ.Database('/endpoint/0.1', { evented: 'no' });
            window.endpoint = db;
            
            AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.core.ide', 'core', db);
            AQ.Widget.import('org.aquameta.core.ide', 'ide', db);
            
            $('body').append(widget('ide:ide'));
            $('body').append(widget('ide:debugger3_manager'));
            
        });
    </script>
</html>
